h2.a: New principals will take the helm at Kurth Primary and Anderson Elementary

div.p: Lufkin ISD Superintendent Lynn Torres announced that Lufkin ISD will have new principals at Kurth Primary and Anderson Elementary for the upcoming school year.

h2.a: Students can use free WiFi in the LHS parking lot

div.p: Lufkin ISD has made free WiFi available for students by parking in the Lufkin High School parking lot.

h2.a: LHS Fang yearbook staff recognized by Balfour for Yearbook Excellence

div.p: The Lufkin High School yearbook staff has been recognized by Balfour Yearbooks with the Featured recognition for its outstanding contribution to scholastic journalism.

h2.a: LHS National Honor Society virtual induction

div.p: Congratulations to our National Honor Society inductees!

h2.a: LISD Board approves resolution for grading guidelines

div.p: Click this post for a list of FAQ’s for the grading guidelines for the end of the school year.

h2.a: New principals will take the helm at Kurth Primary and Anderson Elementary

img.alt: Congratulations to the Lufkin ISD Teachers of the Year!

h2.a: Congratulations to the Lufkin ISD Teachers of the Year!

div.p: Congratulations to our 2019-2020 Teachers of the Year. Your dedication and love for children is paramount. Thanks for all you do!

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix post-11297 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-homepage-featured category-lufkin-isd

img.alt: LHS senior Garin Ashby awarded prestigious National Honor Society scholarship

h2.a: LHS senior Garin Ashby awarded prestigious National Honor Society scholarship

div.p: LHS senior Garin Ashby is one of 575 semifinalists receiving a $3,200 NHS scholarship.

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix et_pb_no_thumb post-11290 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-coronavirus category-homepage-featured category-lufkin-isd

h2.a: Governor issues executive order to close school for the 2019-2020 school year

div.p: During Governor Greg Abbott’s address to the state on Friday, he made the executive order to officially close school for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year.

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix post-11268 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-homepage-featured category-lufkin-isd

img.alt: Lufkin ISD hosting Virtual Job Fair

h2.a: Lufkin ISD hosting Virtual Job Fair

div.p: A job at Lufkin ISD is just a click away! Meet, chat, and interview for that perfect job without ever leaving home! Register today and see why 1,300 employees choose Lufkin ISD!
